name: Productivbook
body:
# Start being productive on Facebook.

### [Install the Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/productivbook/lcmanoclpdbinljjfgmpppellankfoep)

Hate wasting time on your newsfeed when you really only want to use Messages? 

This gets rid of your newsfeed and only gives your messages.   

```
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/productivbook/lcmanoclpdbinljjfgmpppellankfoep
```

### No more news feed. 
~~Spending~~ Wasting hours scrolling through newsfeed posts? This extension lets you stay in touch mainly through messages. You'll still receive notifications from your friends and can comment on posts. 

### Less Noise
Instead of drowning in news feed posts, you'll only see your messages. 

### Authors and Contributors
Authors: 
James (@jamesmaa)
Sumukh (@sumukh)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the extension, post an issue on the github repo.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
